snippet: United Nations diplomats said Monday that the United States and China had reached an agreement on a new sanctions resolution to punish North Korea for its latest nuclear test.
abstract: United Nations diplomats say that United States and China have reached agreement on new sanctions resolution to punish North Korea for its latest nuclear test.
lead_paragraph: United Nations diplomats said Monday that the United States and China had reached an agreement on a new sanctions resolution to punish North Korea for its latest nuclear test.

headline.main: U.S. and China Reach North Korea Deal, Envoys Say
headline.print_headline: U.S. and China Reach North Korea Deal, Envoys Say
